alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued March 03 at 3:24PM EST until March 03 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 61 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 9 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE ANDERSON BLOUNT CAMPBELL KNOX LOUDON MCMINN MONROE POLK UNION THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCOA, ANDREWS, ARCHVILLE, ATHENS, BEARDEN, BENTON, BULLET CREEK, CARYVILLE, CLEAR WATER, CLINTON, CONASAUGA, DENTVILLE, ELK VALLEY, ETOWAH, FINCASTLE, HAPPY VALLEY, HIAWASSE DAM, JELLICO, KNOXVILLE, LA FOLLETTE, LAKE FOREST, LENOIR CITY, LOUDON, LUTTRELL, MADISONVILLE, MARBLE, MARYVILLE, MAYNARDVILLE, MURPHY, NORRIS LAKE, OAK RIDGE, PARKSVILLE, PAULETTE, RELIANCE, ROSE HILL, ROYAL BLUE, SHARPS CHAPEL, SWEETWATER, TOPTON, UNAKA, VIOLET, AND WHITE OAK.
